description: Choosing your own path is tough in life. This is my path.
This is a cheatsheet I created for myself when learning Node / Express. Relatively simple stuff here but it helps me out.

primaryImage.title: Oh I see what you did there. You couldn't figure out anything witty to put there; so instead of a cheater, you put a cheetah.

description: CSS Breakout lets you finally break out of containers gracefully. It relies on only pure CSS so it's fast and extremely portable.
This post is a collection of notes that I took moving over from Heroku to AWS.

primaryImage.title: Remember when Amazon actually referred to a rainforest?
